title: Enchanting Mandalay Escape
description: Discover the alluring beauty of enchanting Myanmar with a three-night stay at the world-renowned Hilton Mandalay. Visit impressive pagodas and incredible temples, while enjoying delicious daily breakfast, one lavish multi-course dinner for two - accompanied by a complimentary bottle of wine, one evening drink per person and return airport transfers.
offer_address: No.1, Junction of 26th & 66th st, Chan Aye Tharzan, 11121 Mandalay, Myanmar

title: Upscale Stay in Mandalay
description: Discover the alluring beauty of enchanting Myanmar with a five-night stay at the world-renowned Hilton Mandalay. Visit impressive pagodas and incredible temples, while enjoying delicious daily breakfast, two lavish multi-course dinners for two -  accompanied by a complimentary bottle of wine per dinner, one nightly cocktail per person and return airport transfers.
offer_address: No.1, Junction of 26th & 66th st, Chan Aye Tharzan, 11121 Mandalay, Myanmar

title: Enchanting Mandalay Escape With Gourmet Inclusions
description: Discover the alluring beauty of enchanting Myanmar with a three-night stay at the world-renowned Hilton Mandalay. Visit impressive pagodas and incredible temples, while enjoying delicious daily breakfast, one lavish three-course dinner for two - accompanied by a complimentary bottle of wine, one evening drink per person and return airport transfers.
offer_address: No.1, Junction of 26th & 66th st, Chan Aye Tharzan, 11121 Mandalay, Myanmar

title: Discover Myanmar at Hilton Mandalay and Nay Pyi Taw
description: Experience the best of Myanmar with a combined stay at the luxe Hilton Mandalay and Hilton Nay Pyi Taw with private transfers between the two. Beginning in the city of Mandalay, enjoy a five-night stay with daily breakfast and two three-course set-menu dinners with a bottle of wine. Transfer to Myanmarâ€™s capital Nay Pyi Taw and spend a further three nights in renowned Hilton luxury with daily breakfast, nightly dinner, one cocktail per person every evening and a rejuvenating 60-minute spa treatment for two.
location_description: Hilton Mandalay with Nay Pyi Taw Stay
